title: Australian diary. No. 099
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Magazine items: At Broken Bay (N.S.W.), the Supervisor of Music, Dept. of Education conducts a camp to give music teachers practical training; poor hardwood country at Woolgoolga is being re-afforested with more valuable pines; a learn to swim campaign in Sydney teaches youngsters to take care of themselves in the water.
